exit_dialog.title: To save or not to save?
exit_dialog.description: If you want to save the game you have the option to do that on our server or locally (this will download a '.aw' file). If you do not want to keep your game state just hit 'exit' :)

tooltips.save_remote: Save your game state on the server
tooltips.exit: All unsaved data will be lost

load_dialog.title: Load saved game
load_dialog.description: If you want to load your game you have the option to do that from our server or from a local '.aw' file. :)

tooltips.load_remote: Select one of your remotely stored game states
